extendedInfo.description: The Trade Show Technology Summit held July 21 in Richardson, Texas is the premier showcase for technology used in events and trade shows. The Future of trade shows is unveiled by the industry leaders gathered under one roof for one day only. Imagine being able to manage your events for anywhere in the world at the touch of a finger. This is a reality today & all these solutions will be made available at this event.This fun-filled day is just $149.00 and includes Continental breakfast, Taste of Richardson, Trade Show, Nationally Recognized Speakers, Work Shops, Printed Materials, Live Demos, 2 Informal Networking events, Cocktails, Appetizers & Music.Be introduced to the cutting edge technology used for producing events & trade shows and the tools for : pre-show promotions, calculating budgets, measuring ROI, engaging attendees; managing inventory, registration and every other aspect of your trade show and events.Get in the technology driver's seat & learn to incorporate technology in your events including: QR codes, RFID, Mobile apps, Virtual Trade Shows, "Twickker", Social Media, On-line Asset Management, Event Management Software, Interactive Media, Live Stream Video.
